html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09532019-06-22,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Venezuela) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (VENEZUELA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) demonstrate that Canada's sanctions are not intended to be permanent; (2) send a clear message to members of the Maduro regime that Canada is willing to review the list of Venezuelan officials sanctioned as long as they support the return to democracy in Venezuela; and (3) show solidarity with the actions of the United States.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0263 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Venezuela) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (VENEZUELA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) demonstrate that Canada's sanctions are not intended to be permanent; (2) send a clear message to members of the Maduro regime that Canada is willing to review the list of Venezuelan officials sanctioned as long as they support the return to democracy in Venezuela; and (3) show solidarity with the actions of the United States.
